alert.note: Alert for Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 4:18PM CDT until July 07 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Kimball County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Eastern Laramie County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 318 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pine Bluffs, or 19 miles west of Kimball, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Pine Bluffs, Oliver Campground, Oliver Reservoir and Bushnell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 401 and 402. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 1 and 13. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
